name: Nightmare Artist
description:
In the desolate, nightmarish battlefield of WW2, the monsters are real, they lurk right in front of your eyes. Survival of the fittest is what dictates the winner - but it isn't very fair. After your friend was taken as a snack, you must travel to find them. If you're not killed yourself.

Best enjoyed with headphones. 

Warning: includes loud noises and flashing lights.

* * * * * * *

A horror point and click game with visuals inspired by a painter who survived the holocaust. An atmospheric game that's sure to make you have a dose of fear!
